@graph.name: Moroccan Vegetable Tagine « Dora's Table
@graph.description: This vegan recipe for moroccan vegetable tagine is one of the best plant-based recipes, the flavors are intense and perfectly balanced.

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: Moroccan Vegetable Tagine
@graph.description: This recipe for Moroccan Vegetable Tagine is one of the best plant-based recipes we have tried yet. The flavors are intense and perfectly balanced.
recipeIngredient: 4  Carrots (large, cut into ½ in. chunks)
1 lb. Yukon gold or fingerling potatoes (halved)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine vegetable broth, chickpeas, lemon and orange zests, can of tomatoes, and bay leaf in a large pot. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine vegetable broth, chickpeas, lemon and orange zests, can of tomatoes, and bay leaf in a large pot. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine spice mix in a small sauté pan set over medium heat and toast. Remove spices from pan and set aside. Once cool, grind in spice grinder.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine spice mix in a small sauté pan set over medium heat and toast. Remove spices from pan and set aside. Once cool, grind in spice grinder.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine red onion, fennel, 2 tbsp. of oil, half the spice mixture, saffron, and toss. Place on a sheet pan lined with parchment paper and roast in oven for 20 min. Remove from oven and place in the pot with the chickpeas.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine red onion, fennel, 2 tbsp. of oil, half the spice mixture, saffron, and toss. Place on a sheet pan lined with parchment paper and roast in oven for 20 min. Remove from oven and place in the pot with the chickpeas.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same bowl, combine potatoes, thyme, 1 tbsp. of olive oil and second half of the spice mixture. Place on a sheet pan with parchment paper and roast in oven for 35 min. Add to pot with chickpeas.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same bowl, combine potatoes, thyme, 1 tbsp. of olive oil and second half of the spice mixture. Place on a sheet pan with parchment paper and roast in oven for 35 min. Add to pot with chickpeas.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same bowl, combine carrots, garlic cloves, and 1 tbsp. of olive oil. Place on a sheet pan with parchment paper. Place cut zucchini and cauliflower separately in the same sheet pan as the carrots, drizzle with 1 tbsp. of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in oven for 30 min. Add to pot with chickpeas.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same bowl, combine carrots, garlic cloves, and 1 tbsp. of olive oil. Place on a sheet pan with parchment paper. Place cut zucchini and cauliflower separately in the same sheet pan as the carrots, drizzle with 1 tbsp. of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in oven for 30 min. Add to pot with chickpeas.

recipeInstructions.text: Add blanched broccoli, blanched green beans, and corn to the pot. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Add blanched broccoli, blanched green beans, and corn to the pot. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring ingredients in the pot to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 min. or until vegetables are cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring ingredients in the pot to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 min. or until vegetables are cooked through.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in bowls with couscous and garnish with almonds, harissa, yogurt, olives, mint, and cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve in bowls with couscous and garnish with almonds, harissa, yogurt, olives, mint, and cilantro.

@graph.keywords: moroccan tagine, vegan tagine, vegetarian tagine
